column1: 1270059745538265088 2020-06-08 18:26:54 UTC <elonmusk> Outcome-based contracting with multiple competitors is vastly better than cost-plus (especially if sole-sourced)
column2: as the former rewards results & latter rewards waste. Outcome contracting should be applied broadly within government. The difference in results will be incredible.

column2: plus forward radar enable to be superhuman. Upcoming software upgrades will increasingly show the potential.
